name: SearchManual
short_description:
A small and fast file searching utility program. Originally was created for a service department to find and display service manuals. It is written in plain C using Win32 API. One executable file only. Easy install and uninstall, 
It is searching recursively from the start folder including the sub folders. Matching the search term with the file path name, ignoring spaces (" ") an hyphens ("-") in the file path name and in the search term. It presents a list of full file paths, it has found. Double clicking one the paths, launches the file, with its associated program.
summary: File Search and Launch Utility Program for Windows
